Mayor Sprunger and Berne's elected officials encourage your support and participation in the Senior Parade as announced by SA Schools:

The Class of 2020 Senior Parade has been approved and is set for Wednesday, May 20 starting at 3 PM (the end of the last day of school). The seniors will be in their vehicles and will be escorted by the Berne Police starting at Spare Time Lanes and going south through Berne on US 27 to 700 S where students will turn towards the HS.

The parade of senior vehicles will loop through the south parking lot of the HS where the SA teachers and staff will be waving and cheering for our seniors. The caravan of vehicles will get back onto US 27 and head south to Geneva and conclude the parade by turning right onto US 116 (Line St.) in Geneva.

The plan is to have community members and businesses line the sides of road of the parade route and cheer and beep and make signs in support of seniors. Please come out and support our graduating Class of 2020!
